backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence mapping dashboard student lookup and department-aware behavior to involved files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files including views, parsing, analytics, components, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes using OKLCH variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading SheetJS for Excel parsing and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing data upload, department and semester filtering, analytics computation, and view switching.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleBar: SVG bar chart with dynamic width, scroll support, and basic bar/label rendering.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleLin: Responsive SVG line chart with grid lines, labeled points, and optional color customization.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimplePie: SVG pie chart computing slice angles, rendering arcs, and displaying a legend with percentages.
frontend/src/features/comparison/Semeste: Renders semester-to-semester analytics with line charts and a detailed comparison table, including trend calculations and a back-navigation option.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Semester: Displays analytics for a selected semester with charts, filters for departments, and navigation to comparison view, handling empty and missing data states.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/StudentR: Provides a search interface to look up student results by roll number, showing matches or department-based warnings.
frontend/src/features/upload/UploadScree: Implements an Excel file upload UI with drag‑and‑drop, parsing, error handling, and processing states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, identity loading, and state management for authentication status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, layout, and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/computeSemest: Calculates per-semester student counts, pass/fail stats, backlog totals, and subject-wise backlog distribution.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseExcelFile.ts: Parses Excel files via XLSX, detects long vs wide formats, and converts rows into structured ParsedData.
frontend/src/lib/format/numberFormat.ts: Provides helpers to format numbers, percentages, and decimals with basic validation.
frontend/src/lib/guards/assertions.ts: Defines assertion utilities to ensure defined values, non-empty arrays, and valid numbers.
frontend/src/lib/state/appFlowTypes.ts: Declares types for student records, parsed dataset structure, and semester analytics output.
frontend/src/lib/students/lookupStudentR: Performs case-insensitive student lookup by roll number and returns matched student records.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and responsive container settings.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing features, and pending requests related to student result lookup.
